metadata.title: CVE-2024-11692 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could cause a select dropdown to be shown over another tab;this could have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 133, Firefox ESR < 128.5, Thunderbird <133, and Thunderbird < 128.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
